name: Great Journey
storyline: Tony The Brave is a 10-year-old-boy, very keen on travels, geography and adventures in general. One day he receives a postcard from his friend in Antarctica with a cry for help. Apparently something weird is going on in his land - an unknown individual is secretly throwing out dirty garbage onto the clean, white snow. The friend asks Tony to help him find out who the mystery character is and stop him, before the snow melts! Professor Glass, an eccentric genius may be able to help with this important task, but well? you have to find him first. Don't wait - it's time to start a great journey!
summary:
Do you like adventures? Would you like to travel the world?

Then don't waste any more time and join Tony and Annie on their mission to save Antarctica, home of their dear friends!

Immerse in a thrilling adventure and visit lots of vibrant sceneries - from small port towns, through hot, sandy deserts and damp, colorful jungle, all the way to the land of snow and ice.

Based on a mainstream technology from our previous game - Grom, making use of enchanting, prerendered backgrounds and smoothly animated, real-time 3D characters, the game looks and feels different than other titles from this genre available on the market today.
